channel.title: Running server using Eclipse error! [Help!]
channel.description:
Ok so I recently got Eclipse and im trying to run a server on it I followed a this tutorial:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/289645-set-up-eclipse-use-servers.html
but for some reason I get this 1 error:
An error occurred while creating the Java project.
Reason: Source folder 'data' in project 'Game' cannot output to distinct folder
can anyone shed some light on how to fix this?

item.title: Running server using Eclipse error! [Help!]
item.dc:creator: @EclipsedSkapez EclipsedSkapez
item.description:

Ok so I recently got Eclipse and im trying to run a server on it I followed a this tutorial:

can anyone shed some light on how to fix this?
